traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the {NAME} or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes {1d10} fire damage.

traits.name: Superior Invisibility
traits.description: As a bonus action, the {NAME} can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is invisible with it.
